##After the city was sealed,

WECHAT denganqing1984

Feature description, here, I will share my writing, reading the book.

![img](data:image/jpeg;base64,)
When I got up early on January 23, I saw the news that the city of Wuhan was closed. After getting up with the mother is cooking a say, the mother is not very understanding, not much attention. She's been whispering so much about the outbreak these last few days, I feel like she's having a hard time processing it. Soon the city of Huanggang was sealed off, and by the afternoon the papers were out of my hometown of Wuxue.

At the same time, company Group also sent a notice: "during the city, the Hubei colleagues on home rest, through nails, mail and contact the company. ". After the closure of the city, if no discomfort, can return to Shanghai, Beijing Work Place. But do not enter the company, can work in the residence for 10-14 days, the company will send a computer to your residence. Wait until the probation period is over before you come to work."

While I was at home for a few days, watching the epidemic spread to many provinces, with many cases of infection in Huanggang, and also in Qichun County, where I had just left, my friend who was taking me to the station, his cousin's mother had been quarantined in the hospital.

As soon as I saw this, I ran to my parents and told them. The mother side Burns a fire to side a bit fidgety ground to say: "You so a day arrive black all say this! " I say: "CAN NOT NOT SAY! "! Don't go where there are too many people. Wear a mask! Wash your hands frequently..."mother said:"In the countryside if you wear a mask, do not laugh dead people. Which one do you think is wearing a mask?"I said anxiously."You can't be careless. Just because someone else doesn't wear it doesn't mean you shouldn't wear it.

In the evening, my mother came to my room to chat, I took the opportunity to show her a dozen epidemic video. "How serious is it? " I said. "Of course. You can't see these news in the countryside. There's a lot of tension outside. ".

Now headache is the New Year from the first day to the third day of the New Year. I said to my mother, "I wish those relatives wouldn't come to pay their respects. ". A lot of people said they wish they had called to say good-bye. My mother said, "well, you can't. Many relatives don't even have contact information. They only come once in the new year. " I added, "then you need to wear a mask. " My mother said, "it's not polite to wear a mask to greet guests. " I was worried, "Is the face important, or life important AH. " Mother said: "You do not pay New Year, can not stop others pay New Year. This block can not stop. "

That's the scary part. The media focus is now on Wuhan, but little is known about the vast countryside of Hubei Province. The current situation is: a large number of migrant workers returning from Wuhan; a county-level and Village-level Hospital with poor conditions, with or without the ability to deal with them; a rural area with few masks to buy, and it is difficult for elders to wear masks, and Happy New Year personnel mobility is strong. And for me personally, I have to tell my family about the dangers of New Year's.

On the morning of January 24th, my mother said to me, "I have already told your brother that I will go to his house in the evening and tomorrow. If a New Year's visitor comes, there will be no one in our family. If anyone asks, he's been out on the street. It seems that nagging about the epidemic every day in front of us has worked. A stone has fallen from my heart.

In the afternoon, my mother took me to the cemetery on a three-wheeler, and I wore a mask, and she wore a mask. She tried to take it off for a while because it sucked. I'm GonNa have to insist she wear it. Many of the people walking in the street have already put on face masks. The number of people wearing masks in polders has obviously increased. Most of the young people wear them, and some old people do not believe in this "evil" and refuse to wear them.

I don't know what will happen next.

This is bound to be an anxious Spring Festival.

WECHAT SWEEPS UP Praise for author
